catalog_info.title: Descriptive Set Theory
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: Mathematics 141 OR permission of the instructor
catalog_info.description: An introduction to the study of definable subsets of reals and their regularity properties (such as Lebesque measurability and the property of Baire). A discussion of the unresolvability of the classical questions in ZFC and their resolution through the introduction of axioms of definable determinacy and strong axioms of infinity.
